text.section: Employees under the jurisdiction of the former Department for Technical Education who are members of a state retirement system as of June 30, 1990, shall remain in their respective retirement systems. All new certified and equivalent employees hired by the office shall be placed in the Kentucky Teachers' Retirement System.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and renumbered 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 9, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 25, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 526, sec. 19, effective August 15, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 469, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1990.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, C, 3, (17) at 631.
